title: The Rainbow - the woman and her situation

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Lawrence uses literary elements and techniques to portray the woman and her situation.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Lawrence uses literary elements and techniques to portray the woman and her situation.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
